Html:
Hi radioman,  can you pls exclude markers where IsVisible = false from the inclusion of the min/max lat/lng rectangle calculation.

Thanks,

when you zoom and centre to a layer there may be markers that are not visible. the calculaton you have that calculates the min/max long/lat rectange includes all markers for a given layer.  I have changed my client code to calc this rectangle by excluding markers where Visible is false.  so the max zoom level for the markers correcly zooms to the required level for only the visible zooms. but for completeness, i suggest that the condition is included in the core. (its only a single line change)

thanks
